sentences.en: A bad cold has made him bleary - eyed.
sentences.cn: 严重的感冒使他视力模糊.

sentences.en: But when your eyes are bleary with exhaustion, one face looks much like another.
sentences.cn: 不过一旦你的两眼尽显疲惫时, 其他人的面孔在你看起来都差不多了.

sentences.en: He appeared at breakfast bleary-eyed and with a hangover.
sentences.cn: 他吃早餐时两眼迷糊，宿醉未醒。

sentences.en: He did not sleep last night, and has been bleary - eyed all day.
sentences.cn: 他昨天一夜没睡, 今天一直睡眼蒙眬.

sentences.en: He stared at Leo with great bleary eyes.
sentences.cn: 他用一双模糊的大眼睛盯着利奥。

sentences.en: He's always bleary - eyed early in the morning.
His eyes were bleary with fatigue.

sentences.cn: 我赶到时睡眼惺忪，头发蓬乱。

sentences.en: Pablo looked at him through his bleary eyes.
sentences.cn: 巴布罗那双目光呆滞的眼睛望着他.

sentences.en: Penny: Why are you looking so bleary eyed this morning?
sentences.cn: 彭妮: 你今早为什么这样睡眼惺忪?

sentences.en: She had bleary red eyes from lack of sleep.
sentences.cn: 她由于缺乏睡眠而双眼昏花，布满血丝。

sentences.en: Steve emerged from his room, unshaven and bleary-eyed.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫从卧室里出来，胡子拉碴，睡眼惺忪。

sentences.en: You look bleary - eyed. What you need most is forty winks.
sentences.cn: 你看来睡眼惺忪,你最需要的是小睡一下.

trans.tran_en: unable to see very clearly, because you are tired or have been crying
